SASKATCHEWAN ARCHIVES QUESTIONNAIRE

PIONEER EXPERIENCES: A GENERAL QUESTIONNAIRE

A word of explanation to the questionnaire:

It is difficult to summarize a general experience on pioneer life because no individual has lived exactly the same experiences as another. Some of the questions will not apply to your experiences; others may provide interesting answers even if there is not sufficient space to answer them all.

This questionnaire is intended for persons who have personal experiences in Western Canada before 1874, and may be answered by anyone who has personal experiences whether born in this province or not.

If more than one member of the family can answer the questions, they should write them on separate sheets or apply for a separate questionnaire.

Other Questionnaires:
